content.title: Choosing the Right Domain Name
content.text: When registering your new domain, there are a few key factors to consider. It can feel overwhelming, but these three tips will help you make the right choice:

content.title: Simplicity and Memorability:
content.text: Select a name that is short, easy to spell, and simple to pronounce. This makes it effortless for visitors to remember and return to your site.

content.title: Brand Alignment:
content.text: Ensure your domain reflects your brand or business. Avoid names that could be confused with others and choose one that strengthens your unique identity.

content.title: SEO and Future Growth:
content.text: Consider how your choice impacts search engine optimization and your potential for future expansion.

content.title: Be Creative with Your Domain Extension
content.text: If the domain name you want is already taken, don't worry—it's the perfect opportunity to get creative with your extension.
At Kraken Hosting, we offer over 1,500 domain extensions to choose from. Scroll down to explore our first-year offers and find the perfect option to launch your new website today.

SslCertificatesSection.header_small: SSL Certificates – Security You Can Trust
SslCertificatesSection.title: Protect your customers’ data with industry-standard encryption.
SslCertificatesSection.description: An SSL certificate is a vital security service that encrypts the traffic between your website and your visitors. This makes it impossible for unauthorized parties to intercept sensitive information, such as login credentials or credit card details.
features: Build Trust: Show your visitors that their security is your priority.
SEO Benefits: Google and other search engines favor secure websites.
Complete Protection: Encryption for every byte of data transferred.

SupportSection.title: 24/7 Live Support
SupportSection.description: Struggling? Our hosting professionals are readily available to help you through Live Chat. No matter if it's your first time setting up or an issue needs resolving, we can assist with any requirement that may arise. Reach out now and let us make the process easy!

DomainFAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Domains
DomainFAQSection.subtitle: Get clear answers about our hosting services and let krakenhosting.io assist you instantly.

questions.question: What is a domain name?
questions.answer: A domain name is your unique address on the internet (like krakenhosting.io). It serves as the gateway to your website, making it easy for visitors to find you without needing to remember complex IP addresses.

questions.question: How do i buy a domain name?
questions.answer: Buying a domain is easy! Simply use the search bar at the top of this page to check if your desired name is available. If it is, add it to your cart, complete the checkout process, and it's yours!

questions.question: I have a domain name with a different registrar. Can I transfer it to krakenhosting.io?
questions.answer: Yes, absolutely. You can transfer your existing domains to Kraken Hosting. The process is simple: unlock your domain at your current registrar, get the EPP/Auth code, and initiate the transfer from our control panel.

questions.question: What is domain privacy and do I need it?
questions.answer: Domain privacy protection hides your personal contact information (name, email, address) from the public WHOIS database. We highly recommend it to prevent spam, identity theft, and unwanted solicitations.

questions.question: How many domain names can I host with KrakenHosting?
questions.answer: Depending on your hosting plan, you can host anywhere from a single domain to unlimited domains. Our 'Kraken' plan, for example, allows for 50 websites.

questions.question: How to Choose a Good Domain Name?
questions.answer: Keep it short, memorable, and easy to spell. Avoid hyphens and numbers if possible. Try to include keywords relevant to your brand or industry, and choose a suitable extension (.com, .io, .se, etc.).

questions.question: Once I Register a Domain, Can I Change It Later?
questions.answer: No, once a domain is registered, you cannot change the name itself. However, you can register a new domain and redirect the old one, or simply start using the new one. Choose carefully!

questions.question: How to Check Domain Availability?
questions.answer: Use our domain search tool at the top of this page. Enter your desired name, and we'll instantly check its availability across hundreds of extensions.

questions.question: How much does a domain name cost?
questions.answer: Domain prices vary by extension (TLD). We offer competitive pricing, with some domains starting as low as €1.99/year. Check our pricing grid for specific TLD costs.
